name: DCA Calculator
author: Harsh Ganatra

sections.description:
This DCA Calculator is a straightforward plugin for calculating your average investment price. It’s perfect if you want to track the value of investments over time, or simply keep an eye on your average buy price in different markets without making any calculations yourself!
Displayed in 4 diffrent versions for Both Stocks or crypto:
shortcode1 = [dca_calculator_basic]
shortcode2 = [dca_calculator_crypto_coin_basic]
shortcode3 = [dca_calculator_stocks_full]
shortcode4 = [dca_calculator_crypto_coin_full]
sections.faq:
What is the shortcodes?

shortcode1 = [dca_calculator_basic]
shortcode2 = [dca_calculator_crypto_coin_basic]
shortcode3 = [dca_calculator_stocks_full]
shortcode4 = [dca_calculator_crypto_coin_full]

How to display?

The DCA Calculator can be displayd with shortcode on your wordpress pages. Use shortcode; “[dca_calculator]”

What this plugin purpose?

This plugin is used for calculating your average investment price. It’s perfect if you want to track the value of investments over time

Is this plugin total free?

Yes, this plugin is created for your ease and it’s future update will also be free.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • First version of the calculator. Showing the correct average cost of investments made over a period of time.

short_description: Simple DCA calculator to view the average cost of investments made over a period of time. 4 diffrent versions for Both Stocks or crypto.
